articles.title: Elon Musk invites Vladimir Putin on Clubhouse App for a chat - Mint
articles.description: Musk is quite active on Clubhouse these days where he often keeps having conversations with famous personalities. Recently, he has also agreed to do a talk with Kanye West. This, however, is his first attempt to do a conversation with a political personality.
articles.content: Tesla boss Elon Musk tweets again! But this time he shifts his focus from Dogecoin and Bitcoin to one of the most guarded political personalities as he invites the Russian President Vladimir Putin fo… [+1953 chars]

articles.title: Vodafone Idea Q3 results: Loss declines to Rs 4,532.1 crore; revenue sees a slight jump - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Vodafone Idea's average revenue per user (ARPU) rose to Rs 121 in the December quarter from Rs 109 in the September quarter.
articles.content:
Vodafone Idea on February 13 reported a consolidated loss to Rs 4,532.1 crore in the third quarter ended December 2020, as against a loss of Rs 6,438.8 crore in the year-ago period.

articles.title: ONGC Q3 Results: Profit Slumps 52% As Expenses, Tax Rise - BloombergQuint
articles.description: Oil & Natural Gas Corp.’s net profit fell 52.1% sequentially to Rs 1,378.23 crore in the quarter ended December.
articles.content:
Oil & Natural Gas Corp.s quarterly profit fell by more than half as expenditure and tax rose.
